ticket.summary: Maple-Please follow RHS team's action and cut a DO ticket

links.summary: [Standard] |  [Standard] | Maple-Please help to check if H100 host got hardware issues

description:
Hi team.

For host : 2415XLG042, please follow RHS's action plan and help to cut a DO. ticket to replace GPU8.
Thanks.

https://jira-sd.mc1.oracleiaas.com/browse/RHS-78810

comments.author: Jira Event Publisher Notifications
comments.body: Ocean has created an incident for this issue. (P2-4A48534B59B5871EE0632B16000A2A26)

comments.author: Jira Event Publisher Notifications
comments.body: Jira failed to sync to status change (In Progress) made in Ocean.  So Ocean's status has been reset to In Progress to match Jira

comments.author: Shrey Shubham
comments.body:
First Comment

This ticket is acknowledged and will be updated with the details shortly.

comments.author: Shrey Shubham
comments.body: HMS doesn't support GPU Allocated hosts, this needs to be checked by HPC so moving the ticket to their queue

comments.author: Sai Krishna Pedagadi
comments.body:
First Comment:

This ticket is acknowledged and will be updated with the details shortly.
